title: Matt Bishop: The comedy amid one of F1's most traumatic weekends
summary: The danger of Formula 1 in the 1980s was all too apparent during a tragic weekend at Zolder 44 years ago, writesMatt Bishop. But even that Belgian Grand Prix had its lighter moments

qa_pairs.question: What significant event occurred at the 1982 Belgian Grand Prix at Zolder?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: The tragic accident that claimed the life of driver Gilles Villeneuve.
wrong_options: A major tire failure for a leading team.
The first use of a safety car in F1.
